1 and 2 clearly states what to do to configure
https://www.cisco.com/c/dam/en/us/td/docs/solutions/CVD/SDWAN/sdwan-wan-edge-onboarding-deploy-guide-2020nov.pdf

Selected Answer: AE
To On-board a WAN edge using enterprise CA [which is the exact same lab setup by Keith B on CBTnug) You need to put a root cert on the edge, which you pull from the vmanage using the request file command. You then need to install it by using the request " request root-cert-chain install"
https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/support/docs/routers/sd-wan/221605-install-root-certificate-on-sdwan-vedges.html

Process for that is B,D.
